snippet.title: Bubble Bobble Game Sample - Game Gear
snippet.description:
Original Air Date: December 26th, 2009

Who doesn't know about Bubble Bobble...I love it and it's a classic to me. This is the Game Gear version, which I bought a little while ago. It's a pretty neat port...but I really don't like how the music restarts after you beat a round. Oh well...it's not the end of the world.

- ADDITION -
